name: Hidden Object: Mystery House
description:
Hidden Object Mystery House You have to find five objects that hidden on the pictures.
To pass each level, you must find all the hidden objects.
Will you find all the hidden objects?
Hidden Object Mystery House is a free game in which your seek and find skills will be challenged like never before!

The game principle is simple: Find a series of hidden objects in a scene! Various objects and environments are available allowing you to replay a scene several times in different configurations

Thank for play Hidden Object Mystery House
